body: Drow are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. All drow have the following racial traits.
name: Drow

sections.body: Drow are Medium creatures, and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.
sections.name: Medium

sections.body: Drow have a base speed of 30 feet.
sections.name: Normal Speed

sections.body: Drow can see in the dark up to 120 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.body: Drow are immune to magic sleep effects and get a +2 racial bonus to saves against enchantment spells.
sections.name: Drow Immunities

sections.body: Drow receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.
sections.name: Keen Senses

sections.body: Drow possess spell resistance equal to 6 plus their class levels.
sections.name: Spell Resistance

sections.body: A drow can cast dancing lights, darkness, and faerie fire each once per day, using his total character level as his caster level.
sections.name: Spell-Like Abilities

sections.body: Abrupt exposure to bright light blinds drow for 1 round; on subsequent rounds, they are dazzled as long as they remain in the affected area.
sections.name: Light Blindness

sections.body: Drow are proficient with the hand crossbow, rapier, and short sword.
sections.name: Weapon Familiarity

sections.body: Drow begin play speaking Elven and Undercommon. Drow with high Intelligence can choose bonus languages from the following: Abyssal, Aklo, Aquan, Common, Draconic, Drow Sign Language, Gnome, or Goblin.
sections.name: Languages
